definition: (of a breeze) to make (hair, leaves, clothing etc) sway gently/to ruffle
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: The breeze made the drops on the grass shine like gold.
sentences.chinese: 草上的露珠在微風拂動下，宛如金子般閃閃發光。

sentences.english: There was not a breath of air, and the swallows were flying low near the water's edge.
sentences.chinese: 空氣中沒有一絲拂動，燕子們在水邊低低地飛着。

sentences.english: Finish with a roll or flick of the brush toward the biting edge.
sentences.chinese: 完了向切端捲起或拂動牙刷。
